thread.section_title: Edge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cozy Comfort
thread.title_full: Cozy Comfort - Review of Edge Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Michelle B
title: Cozy Comfort
text:
I stayed at the Edge Hotel on a Wednesday night, was greeted very nicely at the front desk even though it was late. My room had a great view of the city and was very easy to commute to the nearest subway. Room was clean, minimal, and modern. The breakfast buffet had coffee, juice, and breakfast options! Very happy with staying here, with great customer service, and a warm feel in a busy neighborhood.
Room Tip: Ask for a room with city view. See more room tips
